answers.answer: Yes prolactin elevation can cause some of those symptoms and weight gain and the potential of diabetes can occur from antipsychotics but only a psychiatrist would understand this in full.  However if you had these concerns before you started medication it would be worthwhile to see a doctor and then can refer you to an endocrinologist if needed after doing appropriate tests to see what is happening and what might be the potential cause.
